ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Necklace of Superiority.
ygData.msgSnippet: Actually I ve seen about 5 drop ;)  My guild has been equipping it s warriors with them ;)  I m getting one soon too ;)  (to replace my Runed Lava Pendant).
ygData.messageBody:
Actually I've seen about 5 drop ;) My guild has been equipping it's
warriors with them ;) I'm getting one soon too ;) (to replace my Runed
Lava Pendant).

Lyrnia
----- Original Message -----
From: "Randy Keith" <Kalekona@...>
To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
Sent: Wednesday, July 05, 2000 12:26 PM
Subject: [eqbards] Necklace of Superiority.


> Has ANYONE seen this drop. I don't want to hear stories. I
> want to know if someone has actually seen, and clicked it to
> pick up.
>
> I was camping The Kly this weekend, and saw NOTHING but a
> silly helm. Lore no less.
>
> I have heard rumors from it being removed, being made the
> rare drop, to being moved to The Hole. Can anyone
> substantiate where this item is anymore?
>
>
